description: Indicates Interface Service State is no longer OOS-MA

event.Summary: Interface $v5 is no longer out of service and management (OOS-MA) on slot $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ADTRAN-GENIF-MIB::adGenIfServiceStateOOSMAClear ADTRAN-GENTRAPINFORM-MIB::adTrapInformSeqNum i 9999 SNMPv2-MIB::sysName s EXAMPLE ADTRAN-GENSLOT-MIB::adGenSlotInfoIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE

description: The sequence number included in the last trap originated by
this device. This can be used to confirm receipt of the
latest traps. Not needed by SNMPv2 Informs.
variables.name: ADTRAN-GENTRAPINFORM-MIB::adTrapInformSeqNum

description: An administratively-assigned name for this managed
node. By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified
domain name. If the name is unknown, the value is
the zero-length string.
variables.name: SNMPv2-MIB::sysName

description: A unique value for each slot. Its value may exceed
the value of adGenSlotNumber if pseudo slot numbers
are used for some bank commons or multiplexers.
This object is visible for all rows.
variables.name: ADTRAN-GENSLOT-MIB::adGenSlotInfoIndex

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: Indicates Interface Service State is currently OOS-MA

event.Summary: Interface $v5 is out of service and management (OOS-MA) on slot $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ADTRAN-GENIF-MIB::adGenIfServiceStateOOSMAActive ADTRAN-GENTRAPINFORM-MIB::adTrapInformSeqNum i 9999 SNMPv2-MIB::sysName s EXAMPLE ADTRAN-GENSLOT-MIB::adGenSlotInfoIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE

this device. This can be used to confirm receipt of the
latest traps. Not needed by SNMPv2 Informs.

description: An administratively-assigned name for this managed
node. By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified
domain name. If the name is unknown, the value is
the zero-length string.
variables.name: SNMPv2-MIB::sysName

description: A unique value for each slot. Its value may exceed
the value of adGenSlotNumber if pseudo slot numbers
are used for some bank commons or multiplexers.
This object is visible for all rows.
variables.name: ADTRAN-GENSLOT-MIB::adGenSlotInfoIndex

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr
